name: Onira: Dream Diary & Analysis
subtitle: Your Self-Discovery Journey
description: Unlock the Meaning of Your Dreams. Onira is your personal dream journal app, designed to turn your nighttime visions into deep self-discovery. Thoughtfully crafted with serene aesthetics and neuroscience-backed insights, Onira helps you log, analyze, and interpret your dreams effortlessly.

name: Rushmore: Photo Transformation
subtitle: Cartoonify Your Memories
description: Turn your favorite photos into unforgettable cartoons with Rushmore. Powered by cutting-edge AI, Rushmore transforms your selfies, couple photos, family moments, or even pets into vibrant cartoon artwork in just one tap
